summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Employees' Retirement System; authorizing the payment of a special dividend, in addition to the annual bonus dividend provided in Section 7.1 of Ordinance 78444, based upon a unit value formula to retired members of the City Employees' Retirement system and their beneficiaries who were receiving benefits from the City Employees' Retirement System on December 31, 1972, except beneficiaries receiving payments under Option B of Section 18 of Ordinance 78444 or beneficiaries receiving installment payment of accumulated contributions under Section 19(a) of said ordinance.
